name: FHeaderRowStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SHeaderRow

ColumnStyle: Style of the normal header row columns
LastColumnStyle: Style of the last header row column
ColumnSplitterStyle: Style of the splitter used between the columns
SplitterHandleSize: Size of the splitter used between the columns
BackgroundBrush: Brush used to draw the header row background
ForegroundColor: Color used to draw the header row foreground
HorizontalSeparatorBrush: Brush used to draw the splitter between the header and the contents below it
